title: Democrats Rally Around Biden After Special Counsel Report Questions His Fitness

title: Pakistan election: Rival parties each claim advantage
description: The jailed former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan has claimed victory in Thursday's general election and called on his supporters to celebrate. Independent candidates linked to him have won most seats so far, with the majority of seats declared.

title: Imran Khan posts AI video declaring victory in Pakistani election as candidates backed by his party win most seats despite him being behind bars and communications blackout
description: In the message, which is usually delivered by word through his lawyers, the AI version of Imran Khan rejected rival Nawaz Sharif's earlier claim to victory

title: The power of Europe’s rebellious farmers
description: The extraordinary concessions they won from Brussels this week illustrate their potential to reshape the bloc’s politics

title: Could the Democrats replace Joe Biden?
description: Nikki Haley, Trump’s Republican rival, has repeatedly attacked Trump and Biden for being too old and mentally unfit for the presidency. But she has so far ruled out an independent bid. “I’m a Republican,” she told The Wall Street Journal this week. “A Republican primary is where Republicans run.”

title: Pakistan election: Rival parties each claim advantage as count continues
description: Welcome to our live coverage of Pakistan’s general election. Results have begun to trickle in after yesterday’s vote. Experts say the counting has been slower compared to previous elections.

title: The frightening thing is not that Tories are paraded as more fiscally competent. It’s that even Labour believes it

title: Politics latest news: Labour in fresh green U-turn over windfall tax
description: Rachel Reeves insisted she will still be the UK’s “first green chancellor” despite tearing up Labour’s flagship £28 billion investment pledge. Ms Reeves originally made the statement during her speech at Labour Party conference in 2021.

title: Pensioners abandon the Tories with just a quarter of over-65s planning to vote Conservative at the next election - down from 60% in 2019 - with a surge in support for Reform ...

title: Rod Stewart blasts ‘lying public schoolboy’ Boris Johnson and says Labour should win next election
description: Long-time Tory Rod Stewart has thrown his weight behind Labour’s Keir Starmer ahead of a general election this year. The British rocker, 79, slammed “lying f***ing public schoolboy” Boris Johnson and called for the Conservatives to be booted out of No10 following a string of unelected prime ministers.

title: US election: Donald Trump wins huge victory in Nevada caucus
description: Former President Donald Trump has won the Nevada Republican caucus by a large margin. The only other person whose name was on the ballot was Ryan Binkley, a pastor and businessman. It means Mr Trump will take all Nevada's 26 delegates, the system used by the parties to determine their presidential candidate.

title: Trump flexes his dominance of Nevada GOP but cracks are forming in this crucial battleground

title: 96.88 Cr People Registered To Vote For 2024 LS Election: ECI
description: The Election Commission (EC) on Friday announced that 96.88 crore people are registered to vote for the forthcoming General Elections, marking it the largest electorate. It also added over two crore youth electors in the age group of 18 to 29 years have been added in the voters’ list.

title: Deadline passes: Here's everyone who's running in the May primary elections.

description: Special counsel Robert Hur said in his report that while Biden “willfully retained and disclosed classified materials after his vice presidency when he was a private citizen,” no criminal charges were warranted.
